description: This file contains CSS styles for a front-end application, defining themes and layout for the text formatting interface.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styles controlling layout and core appearance.

classes.name: formatter-main
classes.description: Styles for the main formatting container, providing layout and padding.

classes.name: formatter-title
classes.description: Title styling for the formatter, including font size and background gradient.

classes.name: formatter-description
classes.description: Styling for descriptions under each formatter section, including margins and colors.

classes.name: formatter-panels-container
classes.description: Container styles for holding editor and preview panels.

classes.name: formatter-editor-panel
classes.description: Styling for the editor panel within the formatting interface.

classes.name: formatter-preview-panel
classes.description: Styles for the preview panel of the formatter.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo including responsive height.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header including alignment and background.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles between themes.
